scripts.init: npm run load && npm run geoip
scripts.load: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.geoip: cd backend/node_modules/geoip-lite && npm run-script updatedb license_key=$(cat ../../.env | grep GEOIP | cut -c7-)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" " cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" " cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.setup_db: cd backend && npm run setup_db && npm run fake_db
